src:
Sergio Aguero: Liverpool? Rival Terbesar City itu MU!
05 Nov 2019, 19:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Penyerang Manchester City, Sergio Aguero angkat bicara terkait duel timnya dengan Liverpool di akhir pekan nanti. Aguero menegaskan bahwa laga itu bukan laga terbesar mereka, karena ia menganggap Manchester United adalah rival utama City.
Sebuah pertandingan besar akan tersaji di pekan ke 12 EPL musim ini. Juara bertahan Manchester City bakal berhadapan dengan Liverpool di Anfield pada hari Minggu (10/11) mendatang.
Laga ini dinilai menjadi laga terbesar di Inggris musim ini. Maklum dalam dua tahun terakhir, City dan Liverpool selalu bersaing ketat untuk menjadi juara Inggris.
Namun Aguero menilai bahwa Liverpool bukan rival terbesar City saat ini. "Pertandingan itu mungkin menjadi 'Clasico' untuk televisi, tetapi bagi kami, pertandingan 'clasico' kami adalah ketika kami melawan Manchester United," ujar Aguero yang dikutip Manchester Evening News.

Baca komentar penyerang asal Argentina itu di bawah ini.
text:
Sergio Aguero: Liverpool? City's Biggest Rival MU!
05 Nov 2019, 19:20 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester City striker Sergio Aguero spoke up regarding his team's duel with Liverpool at the weekend. Aguero insisted that the match was not their biggest match, because he considered Manchester United to be City's main rival.
A big match will be presented in Week 12 of the EPL this season. Defending champion Manchester City will face Liverpool at Anfield on Sunday (10/11).
This match is considered to be the biggest match in England this season. Understandably in the last two years, City and Liverpool have always competed to become champions of England.
But Aguero believes that Liverpool are not City's biggest rivals at the moment. "That match might be the 'Clasico' for television, but for us, our 'clasico' was when we were against Manchester United," Aguero was quoted as saying by the Manchester Evening News.

Read the comments of the Argentine striker below.
